original_title: The Pond: There's Something Funny in the Water
overview: Dive into "The Pond," the nationally syndicated Christian children's radio show that delivers faith, fun and family values -- now in an all-new animated adventure! Rendered in colorful computer-generated imagery by the same great minds behind "Hermie & Friends," each episode features a diverse cast of creatures who don't always agree but live together in peace and harmony thanks to a few lessons from the Bible.
title: The Pond: There's Something Funny in the Water
